gitlab-credentials.name: GitLab Credentials
gitlab-credentials.description:
Store a GitLab personal access token to interact with private GitLab
repositories. This block is part of the prefect-gitlab collection. Install prefect-gitlab with `pip install prefect-gitlab` to use this block.
gitlab-credentials.code_example:
Load stored GitLab credentials:
```python
from prefect_gitlab import GitLabCredentials
gitlab_credentials_block = GitLabCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: GitLabCredentials
fields.description:
Store a GitLab personal access token to interact with private GitLab
repositories.

token.title: Token
token.description: A GitLab Personal Access Token with read_repository scope.
token.name: Personal Access Token

gitlab-repository.name: GitLab Repository
gitlab-repository.description: Interact with files stored in GitLab repositories. This block is part of the prefect-gitlab collection. Install prefect-gitlab with `pip install prefect-gitlab` to use this block.
gitlab-repository.code_example:
```python
from prefect_gitlab.repositories import GitLabRepository

gitlab_repository_block = GitLabRepository.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: GitLabRepository
fields.description: Interact with files stored in GitLab repositories.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The URL of a GitLab repository to read from, in either HTTP/HTTPS or SSH format.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: An optional reference to pin to; can be a branch name or tag.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: An optional GitLab Credentials block for authenticating with private GitLab repos.

GitLabCredentials.title: GitLabCredentials

repositories.

token.title: Token
token.description: A GitLab Personal Access Token with read_repository scope.
token.name: Personal Access Token
